newsitem.title: UK: 3I Holdings sets 100 mln stg fungible bond.
newsitem.headline: 3I Holdings sets 100 mln stg fungible bond.

text.p: The following fungible floating-rate issue was announced by lead manager SBC Warburg.
TYPE FRN MARGIN +10 BP PAY DATE 25.JUL.97
LAST MOODY A1 ISS PRICE 99.64 FULL FEES 25 BP
NOTES FUNGIBLE WITH EXISTING 100 MLN STG BOND LAUNCHED
LISTING LONDON DENOMS (K) 100 SALE LIMITS US/UK
NEG PLG YES CRS DEFLT YES FORCE MAJ YES
GOV LAW ENGLISH HOME CTRY UK TAX PROVS STD
MGT/UND 10 BP SELL CONC 15 BP PRAECIPUUM =
